weapons.name: Axe
weapons.description: A heavy battle axe that deals significant damage with each strike.

weapons.name: Cave Staff
weapons.description: A mysterious staff found in ancient caves, imbued with primordial magic.

weapons.name: Craftsman Bow
weapons.description: A finely crafted bow made by master artisans, offering excellent accuracy.

weapons.name: Excalibur Sword
weapons.description: A legendary sword of immense power, said to have belonged to ancient kings.

weapons.name: Iron Dagger
weapons.description: A simple iron dagger, quick and easy to wield in close combat.

weapons.name: Lunar Staff
weapons.description: A staff that harnesses the power of the moon, glowing with ethereal light.

weapons.name: Magic Shield
weapons.description: A shield infused with protective magic, offering enhanced defense.

weapons.name: Mystic Bow
weapons.description: A bow enchanted with mysterious arcane energies, firing arrows of pure magic.

weapons.name: Nature Staff
weapons.description: A staff carved from ancient wood that channels the power of nature itself.

weapons.name: Necro Sword
weapons.description: A dark blade that drains life essence from enemies with each strike.

weapons.name: Royal Shield
weapons.description: A magnificent shield adorned with royal insignia, providing superior protection.

weapons.name: Runed Dagger
weapons.description: A dagger inscribed with ancient runes that enhance its cutting power.

weapons.name: Sorcerers Trident
weapons.description: A powerful trident wielded by the most powerful of sorcerers, crackling with elemental energy.

armor.name: Cloak
armor.description: Heavyweight fabric garment that drapes over the shoulders, offering minimal protection but excellent mobility

armor.name: Thief Threads
armor.description: Sturdy, form-fitting armor crafted from dark leather, designed for silent movement and quick getaways.

armor.name: Classic Armor
armor.description: Light armor made from leather, offering basic protection.

armor.name: Mage Robes
armor.description: Robes enchanted with defensive runes that provide decent protection and enhance magical abilities.

armor.name: Dragon Armor
armor.description: Armor forged from dragon scales, providing exceptional protection against both physical and magical attacks.

locations.name: Dark Castle
locations.description: A foreboding castle shrouded in eternal night.
locations.storyText: The castle's towering spires pierce the sky. Inside, shadows twist and watch your every move.

locations.name: Enchanted Forest
locations.description: A magical forest where beauty hides danger.
locations.storyText: Mystical lights dance through the trees. The air hums with magicâ€”and menace.

locations.name: Forbidden Forest
locations.description: An untamed wilderness avoided by even the bravest.
locations.storyText: Gnarled trees and thick mist obscure your path. Danger lurks behind every bush.

locations.name: Great Mountains
locations.description: Snowy peaks where dragons and ancient secrets sleep.
locations.storyText: Cold winds bite at your face as you scale the steep trails. A roar echoes across the peaks...

locations.name: Royal Castle
locations.description: The seat of power and the heart of the kingdom.
locations.storyText: Golden banners fly in the wind as you approach the Royal Castle. It now stands as a fortress against you. Branded a traitor, you are now being hunted down by the Royal Guard.
